Package goal.core.runtime

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RuntimeEventObserver
    interface to observe events from the RuntimeManager.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MessagingService
    Provides the following messaging services: Launching a messaging service. Shutting down the messaging service. DOC what does this add to the Messaging interface?
    RemoteRuntimeService<D extends Debugger,C extends GOALInterpreter<D>>
    Handles messaging between the local run time and remote runtime.
    RuntimeEvent
    Represents information related to an event generated by the platform rather than an agent.
    RuntimeManager<D extends Debugger,C extends GOALInterpreter<D>>
    The RuntimeServiceManager is a LOCAL controller.
    RuntimeMessageBox
    This class handles the RuntimeManager's messagebox.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RuntimeEvent.EventType
    Event types that relate to platform related events which are NOT generated by an agent itself.
